hero.description: I'm passionate about programming and building innovative software solutions that enhance efficiency, optimize processes, and support smarter decision-making.

about.description: I am an Informatics Engineering graduate with a strong passion for programming and software development. My journey began with curiosity about how technology can solve real-world problems. I combine technical expertise with creative problem-solving to build efficient, reliable, and impactful solutions.
about.careerGoals: My goal is to become a skilled software developer who can design and build reliable, efficient, and scalable applications. I'm particularly interested in exploring modern technologies, clean code practices, and innovative solutions that solve real-world problems.

projects.title: Mobile Developer Trip Plan
projects.description: Developed a mobile application for managing and planning trip itineraries with features such as schedule management, destination details, and user-friendly interface.

projects.title: VR Candi Borobudur
projects.description: Interactive VR experience of Borobudur Temple for Oculus Quest 2, focusing on the lower and upper zones with immersive guided tour elements.

projects.title: Go Test API
projects.description: RESTful API sederhana untuk manajemen data film, dibangun dengan Golang dan PostgreSQL. Mendukung operasi CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) dengan struktur clean dan modular.

projects.title: Audio to Text Converter
projects.description: A Python-based tool that converts audio recordings into text. Supports multiple audio formats and provides accurate transcription for easier content processing.

projects.title: CMS Admin Dashboard
projects.description: Content Management System dashboard for managing marketing, IT, human capital, and product data, built with Node.js, Express, Sequelize, and MySQL.

projects.title: Netflix Clone App
projects.description: A mobile application clone of Netflix built with Dart and Flutter, featuring movie listings, search functionality, and a responsive UI for seamless streaming experience.

projects.title: Trip Planner Budget Optimization
projects.description: Web application that helps users plan trips efficiently by minimizing costs. Features include destination selection, budget estimation, and optimized travel itinerary.

projects.title: Notes App
projects.description: A full-stack notes management web application built with Next.js and PostgreSQL. Features include user authentication, create/read/update/delete notes, and responsive UI for seamless note-taking.

experience.title: Fullstack Programming Instructor Intern
experience.description: Worked as an instructor for Fullstack Programming, guiding students in hands-on projects and mentoring them through the learning process.
achievements: Conducted coding workshops and mentoring sessions for students
Assisted in curriculum development for fullstack programming
Provided feedback and guidance for student projects

experience.title: Mobile Developer Intern
experience.description: Developed a Trip Planner mobile application to improve travel management for the company.
achievements: Built and deployed mobile app features to enhance user experience
Collaborated with team members on app design and implementation
Tested and debugged applications to ensure quality and performance

experience.title: Project-Based Learning Participant
experience.description: Worked on a web Trip Planner project aimed at minimizing travel budgets for users. Project focused on planning and feasibility, though it was not deployed.
achievements: Designed and planned web-based trip planner solution
Collaborated with team members to develop project requirements
Applied problem-solving and design thinking in project planning

experience.title: VR Borobudur Project (Final Year Thesis)
experience.description: Developed a VR experience of Candi Borobudur for Oculus Quest 2, focusing on immersive educational and cultural content. Collaborated with KBRI Hungary for cultural dissemination.
achievements: Designed and implemented immersive VR zones representing Candi Borobudur
Optimized user experience to maximize engagement and interactivity
Coordinated with international stakeholders to ensure cultural accuracy
